column3: Concept ACK. Globals are really the stick-in-the-mud when it comes to testing.

> Concept ACK. Globals are really the stick-in-the-mud when it comes to testing.\n\nI've now created a little script that runs each benchmark in a separate process, and the same for unit tests, and it looks like `BlockToJsonVerbose` was the only one that did not work. So it's not so bad :)
Doesn't matter here, but it would be good to specify `-nodebuglogfile` to be on the safe side
